email_template.name: community_product_submitted
email_template.subject: Community Product Submission for Public Sector Open Data Portal
email_template.content:
Dear {{name}},

Your submission of the community product **{{product_name}}** has been received for showcasing on <https://data.gov.my>. If it passes moderation checks (for spam, abuse, violence, etc.), it will be published on ou n[Community Products page](https://data.gov.my/community-products).

If the community product is approved/rejected, you will be notified at this email.

Thank you for contributing to our community showcase.

Warm regards,

 ** _Public Sector Open Data Team  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**
email_template.html_content:
Dear {{name}},

Your submission of the community product {{product_name}} has been received for showcasing on https://data.gov.my. If it passes moderation checks (for spam, abuse, violence, etc.), it will be published on our Community Products page.

If the community product is approved/rejected, you will be notified at this email.

Thank you for contributing to our community showcase.

Warm regards,

Public Sector Open Data Team
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital

email_template.name: community_product_submitted
email_template.subject: Pendaftaran Produk Komuniti untuk Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam
email_template.content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Pendaftaran produk komuniti **{{product_name}}** anda telah diterima untuk
dipaparkan di <https://data.gov.my/ms-MY>. Produk anda akan diterbitkan di [halaman Produk Komuniti](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/community-products) kami setelah disemak dan mendapat kelulusan.

Pemakluman berkenaan status permohonan ini **(diluluskan/ditolak)** akan dihantar kepada anda menerusi e-mel.

Terima kasih kerana menyumbang kepada halaman Produk Komuniti kami.

Sekian, terima kasih.

**_Admin Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**
email_template.html_content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Pendaftaran produk komuniti {{product_name}} anda telah diterima untuk dipaparkan di https://data.gov.my/ms-MY. Produk anda akan diterbitkan di halaman Produk Komuniti kami setelah disemak dan mendapat kelulusan.

Pemakluman berkenaan status permohonan ini (diluluskan/ditolak) akan dihantar kepada anda menerusi e-mel.

Terima kasih kerana menyumbang kepada halaman Produk Komuniti kami.

Sekian, terima kasih.

Admin Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital
